Reviews.Content: Escape do it again. Well having stayed in Florence Escape, Rome Escape, Amsterdam Escape and as I type I am in Barcelona Escape.Barcelona Snug, not as nice as AmsterdamSnug but a nice apartment still. Lovely colours and decor but no playstation 2 and other bits and bobs.Amazzing location right in the heart of the city and David was on hand to offer wonderful advice on places to eatWould stay again.My next Escape is to New York trying New York Escape
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Great Staff and Pretty Apartment. We loved the Picass Apartment. We'll be back. We're gonna make plans for when all the big ships sail into Amsterdam in August of 2005. Thanks for all your hospitality. Mike Stayed Summer 2004.
Reviews.Author: escapeworld

Reviews.Content: Lovely clean apartments in amazing location. Me and my gal stayed with BarcelonaEscape, we stayed with them last year in Amsterdam , AmsterdamEscape, so we used them again for this trip. We got a really nice clean place, not a modern place but a real Barcelona apartment right in the middle of all the excitement. Great decor, air-con and lots more. No dvd player but. Next trip-- Prague.Frank
Reviews.Author: percy245
